description:
Kanshi cried as he clung to Morihito. And that`s because Kanshi immediately blew away his allowance and can`t pay the monthly living expenses to the Otogi household. And so, Morihito hands him a flyer for a hero show for hire being held at Akebono Park.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Journal des jobs de Kanshi ~Le show de Super-Héros~ / Journal des jobs de Kanshi ~Job d`appoint~
Kanshi no Baito Nikki: Hero Show / Kanshi no Baito Nikki: Naishoku
Kanshi`s Part-Time Job Diaries: The Superhero Show / Kanshi`s Part-Time Job Diaries: The Side Job
Zapiski z pracy dorywczej Kanshiego: Pokaz superbohaterów / Zapiski z pracy dorywczej Kanshiego: Praca w domu
カンシのバイト日記 ~ヒーローショー~ / カンシのバイト日記 ~内職~
